messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Jess Jenkers (Curator)
messages.body:
Blood and Gore found in bar?!
Could this be a sign of a murderer on our station?!

messages.author: Tul-Ullis (Head of Personnel)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Idiot nerd gets pinned and choked by byoo</font>

comments.author: Tul-Ullis (Head of Personnel)
comments.body: i messed up on the photo hecky
